references: J. Mestel, Archimedeans Problems Drive 1977, Eureka, 39 (1978), 38-40.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..25
mathematica: t = {0, 1}; Do[AppendTo[t, t[[-2]]^2 - t[[-1]]], {n, 18}]; Abs[t] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Feb 23 2012 *)nxt[{n_,a1_,a2_}]:={n+1,a2,a2+(-1)^n*a1^2}; Drop[Transpose[NestList[nxt,{0,0,1},20]][[3]],2] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 03 2012 *)
prog: (Haskell)a005605 n = a005605_list !! na005605_list = 0 : 1 : zipWith (+) (tail a005605_list)   (zipWith (*) (cycle [-1,1]) (map (^ 2) $ a005605_list))-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 16 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
